snippet: Denver Broncos quarterback Peyton Manning said on Monday he has not yet decided whether he will retire following Super Bowl 50 and that he is strictly focused on winning his second NFL championship....
lead_paragraph: Denver Broncos quarterback Peyton Manning said on Monday he has not yet decided whether he will retire following Super Bowl 50 and that he is strictly focused on winning his second NFL championship.

headline.main: Broncos' Manning Says No Decision Yet on Retirement
headline.print_headline: Broncos' Manning Says No Decision Yet on Retirement
